profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on full-stack development and integration with existing systems, with only a mention of LLM and AI ethics in the company description. There is no explicit mention of core GenAI engineering tasks like model fine-tuning, RAG implementation, or prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Backend- en frontend-services ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, monitoren en optimaliseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the design, development, monitoring, and optimization of backend and frontend services, which are core activities in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van integraties met verschillende API's van onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: Building integrations with customer APIs falls under software development, specifically focusing on connecting different systems and services.
Integrating with contact centers involves developing software to connect systems and facilitate communication, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan de UI om documenttraining en aanmoediging toegankelijk te maken voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: Working on the UI to make features accessible to customers is a direct software development responsibility, focusing on the user interface.

job_tasks.phrase: Het verbeteren van onze code en voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven
job_tasks.justification: This describes the ongoing process of code improvement, focusing on maintainability and scalability, which are key aspects of software development.

Mentioning neural networks, LLM, and AI ethics indicates an awareness of the broader technological context and ethical considerations relevant to the company's domain, aligning with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: gebruiksvriendelijk zijn om wijdverspreid te worden aangenomen en geen ongelijkheid te veroorzaken
job_tasks.justification: This phrase reflects an understanding of the business goals related to AI adoption, user-friendliness, and ethical implications, which is part of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: het voor mensen supergemakkelijk te maken om nuttige AI-assistenten op de werkplek te gebruiken en het potentieel van digitale transformatie op het werk te benutten
job_tasks.justification: This describes the company's mission and business objective of making AI assistants accessible and leveraging digital transformation, falling under business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: creëren we de meest gebruiksvriendelijke digitale collega's, aangedreven door AI
job_tasks.justification: This statement articulates the company's product vision and business strategy, which is a component of business understanding.

technologies.justification: TypeScript is explicitly mentioned as a required development language.
LLM is mentioned in the context of the company's focus and technology.
AI is mentioned as a core technology driving the company's products.
ChatGPT is mentioned as a reference point for the company's early involvement in the LLM/genAI space.

soft_skills.justification: Being open-minded is a trait that supports problem-solving and adaptability.
Being proactive indicates initiative and a willingness to take ownership, aligning with innovation and ownership.
The ability to work independently is crucial for problem-solving and pragmatic execution.
Taking security and privacy seriously directly relates to ethical and legal responsibilities in technology development.
